sentences.en: Charles looked round him at the dingy smoke - discoloured walls, the wormeaten staircase.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯看到墙壁到处是烟熏的痕迹, 给虫蛀厂的楼梯.

sentences.en: Feliks is on the middle staircase and the top floor.
sentences.cn: 费利克在中间的楼梯顶层.

sentences.en: Five firemen narrowly escaped death when a staircase collapsed beneath their feet.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的一段楼梯坍塌时,5名消防队员险些丧命。

sentences.en: Footsteps on the staircase interrupted his train of thought.
sentences.cn: 楼梯上传来脚步声,打断了他的思路.

sentences.en: He followed her up a rickety staircase to a squalid bedsit.
sentences.cn: 他跟着她上了一段摇摇晃晃的楼梯，来到了一间邋遢的卧室起居室两用房间。

sentences.en: Louisa was always walking down the staircase, towards that pit of shame.
sentences.cn: 露意莎不断地从楼梯上一级级往下, 朝那个伤风败俗的泥坑走去.

sentences.en: Now he made himself believe he was racing down an endless staircase.
sentences.cn: 这一回,他使自己相信他正在朝一条无尽头楼梯下面跑着.

sentences.en: She climbed the staircase cautiously, holding fast to the rail.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧地抓着栏杆，小心翼翼地爬楼梯。

sentences.en: She heard the priest's familiar, flat footfall on the staircase.
sentences.cn: 她听到楼梯上传来牧师那熟悉的单调脚步声。

sentences.en: She ran for the staircase and down the steps, taking them two at a time.
sentences.cn: 她跑向楼梯，一步两级地奔下台阶。

sentences.en: The house has a superb staircase made from oak and marble.
sentences.cn: 这座房子的楼梯堪称一流，是由橡木与大理石制成的。

sentences.en: The result is the staircase pattern shown in Fig 6 - 22.
sentences.cn: 这样的结果,是图6 - 22展示的阶梯图形.

sentences.en: The wicket opened on a stone staircase, leading upward.
sentences.cn: 小门通向一道上行的石梯.

sentences.en: There was a stone staircase against the side of the house.
They walked down the staircase together.
